text: Graminampaiki je mage soduna dile gele hote, te ata tumhala niscita mhanatila ki amhi apalya dhana-sampatti va santatitaca vyasta rahilo, tevha tumhi amacyasathi maphici du'a-prarthana kara. He loka apalya tondanni te bolatata, je tyancya manata nahi. Tumhi uttara dya ki tumacyasathi allahatarphe ekhadya gosticahi adhikara kona balagato, jara to tumhala nukasana pohacavu icchila kinva tumhala kahi labha pohacavu icchila? Kimbahuna tumhi je kahi karita ahata, allaha te cangalya prakare janato
